judge_outputs.raw: {"aspect_votes": {"inquiry_quality": "B", "persona_adaptation": "B", "methodology_critique": "B", "plan_completeness": "B", "literature_quality": "B", "actionability_risks": "B", "guideline_adherence": "B"}, "winner": "B", "justification": "System B is better because it is more specific and actionable. It identifies more nuanced threats to validity and proposes more concrete analyses to address them. System A is more general and less detailed in its recommendations."}

parsed.justification: System B is better because it is more specific and actionable. It identifies more nuanced threats to validity and proposes more concrete analyses to address them. System A is more general and less detailed in its recommendations.
